meta.title: Warden Deliverable Registry
meta.description: Authoritative registry of all system-generated artifacts and echoes.

deliverables.name: Onboarding Handshake
deliverables.description: Initial alignment echo including principles and role acceptance.
deliverables.purpose: Establishes formal Engineer/Director stewardship.

deliverables.name: Environment Manifest
deliverables.description: Telemetry of hardware and software prerequisites.
deliverables.purpose: Ensures environment parity for multi-threaded execution.

deliverables.name: Structural Mapping
deliverables.description: Echo of functional domains and logic boundaries.
deliverables.purpose: Bridges the gap between process awareness and product awareness.

deliverables.name: Survey Acknowledgement
deliverables.description: Explicit Director authorization to proceed from Survey to Plan.
deliverables.purpose: Enforces external validation of context gathering.

deliverables.name: Mission Brief
deliverables.description: Qualitative synthesis of the context, problem, constraints, and success criteria.
deliverables.purpose: Ensures the Engineer understands the Director's intent before planning.

Context.description: The background and situation of the mission.

Problem.description: The core issue to be addressed.

Constraint.description: Any limitations or restrictions on the solution.

Success.description: The criteria for determining if the mission is accomplished.

deliverables.name: System Glossary
deliverables.description: Domain-bounded semantic definitions for system taxonomy.
deliverables.purpose: Ensures shared semantic understanding between actors.

deliverables.name: Interaction Report
deliverables.description: A structured citation manifest of Engineer interactions with system tools.
deliverables.purpose: Provides granular telemetry for Post-Implementation Reviews.

deliverables.name: Compliance Report
deliverables.description: Automated cross-reference of session telemetry against Goals and Standards.
deliverables.purpose: Provides closed-loop verification of process fidelity.

deliverables.name: Compliance Assessment
deliverables.description: Three-way verification of Engineer Claims vs. Warden Logs.
deliverables.purpose: Validates Intent against Reality.

deliverables.name: Compliance Acknowledgement
deliverables.description: Explicit Director authorization of the compliance assessment.
deliverables.purpose: Finalizes the audit loop.

deliverables.name: Engineer Compliance Audit
deliverables.description: Qualitative analysis of the Warden assessment, reconciling intent vs reality.
deliverables.purpose: Provides Engineer's perspective on the audit delta.

deliverables.name: Artifact Audit
deliverables.description: Qualitative verification that a generated artifact meets requirements and schema.
deliverables.purpose: Prevents open-loop generation by forcing active review of outputs.

deliverables.name: Proficiency Certification
deliverables.description: Evidence of successful GSD cycle execution on non-logic artifacts.
deliverables.purpose: Unlocks full Engineer designation.

deliverables.name: Integrity Snapshot
deliverables.description: Cryptographic signature and binary baseline of all protocols.
deliverables.purpose: Ground truth for regression detection and restoration.

deliverables.name: Fidelity Audit
deliverables.description: Side-by-side granular diff of protocol modifications.
deliverables.purpose: Prevents unauthorized baseline drift.

deliverables.name: Error Trace
deliverables.description: Captured stack trace or syntax error location.
deliverables.purpose: Identifies root cause for emergency recovery.

deliverables.name: Implementation Plan
deliverables.description: Strategic technical proposal for logic changes.
deliverables.purpose: Ensures Director/Engineer alignment before execution.

Objective.description: The primary goal of the implementation.

Standards.description: Applicable system standards for this task.

deliverables.name: Plan Approval
deliverables.description: Explicit Director authorization to proceed from Plan to Execute.
deliverables.purpose: Enforces external validation of implementation strategy.

deliverables.name: Verification Approval
deliverables.description: Explicit Director authorization to proceed from Verify to Finalize.
deliverables.purpose: Enforces external validation of fidelity audit results.

deliverables.name: Recovery Patch
deliverables.description: Unified Diff persisted as a recoverable file.
deliverables.purpose: Provides rollback capability and audit trail.

deliverables.name: Post-Implementation Review
deliverables.description: Synthesis of product outcome and process performance.
deliverables.purpose: Formalizes development cycle closure.

deliverables.name: Actionable Knowledge Entry
deliverables.description: Persistent record of friction remediations and lessons learned.
deliverables.purpose: Mitigates context loss for zero-knowledge systems.

deliverables.name: README Document
deliverables.description: Compiled Markdown summary of the project state.
deliverables.purpose: Primary project-facing documentation.

deliverables.name: Protocols Library
deliverables.description: Compiled Markdown manual of all system rules.
deliverables.purpose: Authoritative governance documentation.

deliverables.name: Status Report
deliverables.description: Synthesized JSON report of health and debt.
deliverables.purpose: Real-time visibility into engine state.
